description: Number of non-Abelian (finite) groups with n conjugacy classes.
references: E. K. Annavaddar, Determination of the Finite Groups Having Eight Conjugacy Classes. Ph.D. Diss., Arizona State Univ., 1971.
J. Poland, Finite groups with a given number of conjugate classes. Canad. J. Math. 20 1968 456-464.
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: Index entries for sequences related to groups
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
extensions: a(8) corrected and a(9)-a(12) from _Michael Somos_, Aug 10 2010
